beginning.event: Humanity retreats to Mars after a devastating war on Earth. A group of colonists is sent back to restart human civilization on Earth.

ending.task: The colonists must overcome the harsh conditions on Earth and rebuild human civilization.
ending.conflict: They must also deal with the remnants of the alien invaders who nearly wiped out humanity.

game.synopsis: A group of colonists must restart human civilization on Earth after a devastating war. They must overcome the harsh conditions and the remnants of the alien invaders.
game.title: Return to Earth
